channel.title: How to change the amount of kills required
channel.description:
Hey guys im just wondering how do i change the amount of kills required to buy and use a weapon since. I also need to know how to change the amount u need to equip it because it will give a message saying u need this many kills to equip this weapon or armour.
Thanks :P
